mapper.sql:
temp_message_record.record_id as temp_message_record_record_id, temp_message_record.record_title as temp_message_record_record_title, temp_message_record.record_send as temp_message_record_record_send, temp_message_record.record_memberid as temp_message_record_record_memberid, temp_message_record.creater_time as temp_message_record_creater_time, temp_message_record.email_id as temp_message_record_email_id
,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_message_record_record_send_display ,temp_member.member_real_name as temp_message_record_record_member_display
LEFT JOIN t_member temp_member ON temp_member.member_id = temp_message_record.record_memberid LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_message_record.record_send
mapper.insert:

email_id,

where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
